text: Today we are learning English with Toy Story!

We’re going to look at a couple 
iconic scenes from the second movie.

And if you want to keep learning with the 
best movies and TV series so you can finally

understand fast speaking natives without 
getting lost, without missing the jokes,

and without subtitles, then just click on 
the subscribe button and bell down below.

Like community member Nora who says 
that she is amazed that thanks to our

channel now she can understand more 
70% of movies when she watches them!

And do you get frustrated when natives speak fast 
like this, and you can’t understand? Do you feel

lost and confused if you don’t have the subtitles?
Now it is not important that you speak this way.

But mastering connected speech like this 
is absolutely crucial if you want to

confidently understand native speakers.
And this is exactly why in our Fluent

with Friends course we help you to 
learn the principles of connected speech

so that you can understand natives at any speed!
The best part? You can try it absolutely free

with our 3-part masterclass. Just click here or 
in the description down below to join that now!

I hope you enjoyed learning with Toy Story 2 
today. If you can’t get enough of lessons with

your favorite TV series, movies, and songs, then 
make sure you follow us on Instagram because we

make new lessons there every single day.
Next, I would recommend that you learn

English with this lesson from the first Toy 
Story. Let’s check out a clip from that!
